programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: Matt Bradley and the Bears try to snap a three-game slide as they host the Dons. California fell to 2-4 after a 74-62 loss at Pepperdine on Dec. 9. Bradley, a 6'4 junior guard, scored a career-high 27 points in that game and is averaging 19.5 ppg.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: The Cardinal seek their 10th straight victory over the Cougars. Stanford has won 13 of the last 14 meetings after a 75-60 triumph Jan. 9. Cardinal leading scorer and rebounder Oscar da Silva erupted for 27 points and 13 boards in that game.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: The Trojans cross the City of Angels to meet the Bruins. USC has won three straight meetings after a 66-48 decision Feb. 6. The Trojans' Ethan Anderson had 19 points and five 3-pointers off the bench, and Tahj Eaddy added 16 points in that game.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: The Cougars and Sun Devils play the opener of a two-game set in the Grand Canyon State. The schools split the 2019-20 season series with Arizona State winning at home 83-74. The Sun Devils' Alonzo Verge Jr. scored a team-high 20 points in that game.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: Bragging rights in the Grand Canyon State are on the line when the Wildcats (10-3, 4-3 Pac-12) visit the Sun Devils (4-6, 1-3). Arizona State has won three of the last four meetings after salvaging a 2019-20 series split with a 66-65 victory.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: The Ducks wrap up a two-game road swing by facing the Wildcats. Oregon has won five straight against Arizona, although three of those victories required overtime. Ducks guard Will Richardson averaged 12.5 points against the Wildcats last season.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: The Wildcats polish off a two-game Rocky Mountain tour when they take on the Buffaloes. Arizona dispatched Colorado 88-74 in a Dec. 28, 2020, meeting on the strength of James Akinjo's 22 points and eight assists. Colorado is 6-1 at home this season.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: The Bruins look to claim a regular-season series sweep of the Sun Devils in this matchup. Cody Riley scored half of UCLA's 16 points in overtime as his side took down Arizona State 81-75 on Jan. 7. Alonzo Verge Jr. (ASU) scored 25 points in the loss.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.sub-title: Pac-12 Tournament: Oregon State vs. UCLA
programme.desc: The No. 4 Bruins battle with the No. 5 Beavers in a quarterfinal match at the 2021 Pac-12 Tournament. The schools have not crossed paths in the conference tournament since a 2006 quarterfinal win by UCLA, which defeated Oregon State 57-52 on Jan. 30.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.sub-title: Pac-12 Tournament: Oregon State vs. Oregon
programme.desc: The red-hot Ducks and the upset-minded Beavers resume their rivalry in the Pac-12 Tournament semifinals. No. 1 Oregon has won six straight after a 91-73 quarterfinal triumph over Arizona State. No. 5 Oregon State outlasted UCLA 83-79 in overtime.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.sub-title: Pac-12 Tournament: Oregon State vs. Colorado
programme.desc: The No. 3 Buffaloes face the No. 5 Beavers for the Pac-12 Tournament title in Las Vegas. Oregon State stunned rival and top seed Oregon 75-64 to reach its first conference tournament final since 1988. Colorado seeks its first crown since 2012.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: No. 17 Oregon (8-1, 3-0 Pac-12) tries to exorcise its demons at 5,345 feet when it visits Colorado (7-3, 1-2). The Ducks are 0-9 in Boulder after losing 74-65 last season as the No. 4 team in the nation. Oregon has won eight straight games.

programme.title: Backstage: Lakers
programme.desc: An all-access look at opening night of the season as the Lakers receive their championship rings. See and hear how the rings were made and the significance behind them. Plus, a special look at a Media Day unlike any other.

programme.title: Backstage: Lakers
programme.desc: Exclusive access to Frank Vogel's training camp. The Lakers head coach is mic'd up as he prepares his team during the shortest off-season in NBA history. Plus, after a hot start to the season, a look at Kyle Kuzma's time in L.A.

programme.title: Backstage: Lakers
programme.desc: The Lakers' biggest stars continue to find ways to inspire on the court and in the communities that raised them. Although these players currently wear the purple and gold, they haven't forgotten where they came from.

programme.title: Backstage: Lakers
programme.desc: The NBA observes MLK day in 2021 with plenty to reflect on - including an incredible effort from LeBron James and the Lakers to turn STAPLES Center into a polling place last November.

programme.title: Backstage: Lakers
programme.desc: An All-Star showdown of championship contenders, as a Laker guard takes on his former team?while thinking about his father's former team. Also, see the inspiring story of one author's unique relationship with Kobe Bryant.

programme.title: Backstage: Lakers
programme.desc: An inside look at life on the road as the Laker coaching staff game plans for their opponents. Plus, the team sees a few familiar faces integral in last season's championship...as the road trip rolls on.

programme.title: Backstage: Lakers
programme.desc: The NBA's greatest rivalry resumes with its newest chapter, but not before taking a look at its historic past. Plus, how one of those game's greatest players is lending his support to a unique program for at-risk students.

programme.title: Backstage: Lakers
programme.desc: A special look at a one-of-a-kind season thus far - from an unforgettable championship celebration to the road through a tough title defense. Plus, how Kobe Bryant continues to inspire art all over the world.

programme.title: Backstage: Lakers
programme.desc: The Lakers enjoy the comforts of home - a look at the different sights and sounds of a unique practice. Plus, with an NBA Finals rematch on the schedule, Laker players past and present reflect on their most recent triumph.

programme.title: Backstage: Lakers
programme.desc: LeBron James captains his All-Star team for the fourth year in a row including an entertaining back-and-forth draft with Kevin Durant; a look back at the first half of the Lakers season.

programme.title: Backstage: Lakers
programme.desc: All eyes are on LeBron and company as they continue their title defense; another team at STAPLES Center is hard at work to make sure the games sound and feel the same to the viewers at home; the first woman head athletic trainer in the NBA.

programme.title: Backstage: Lakers
programme.desc: Lakers honors the life and legacy of Hall of Famer Elgin Baylor. A look back at his storied career on and off the floor, as well as behind the scenes of his star-studded statue unveiling just a few years ago.

programme.title: Backstage: Lakers
programme.desc: An all-access pass to Lakers head coach Frank Vogel's coach's meetings and his staff's detailed game preparation. Plus, two key players from last year's title team return home to reap the benefits of their 2020 championship.

programme.title: Backstage: Lakers
programme.desc: The defending champions gain a crucial component to their title defense with the addition of new center Andre Drummond! Follow along Andre Drummond's first day as a Laker, as the two-time all-star looks to fit right in wearing purple & gold.

programme.title: Backstage: Lakers
programme.desc: A look back at coach Frank Vogel - his journey to L.A., his championship DNA, and how he's preparing the Lakers for a title defense.

programme.title: Backstage: Lakers
programme.desc: For the first time in over a year, the heart and soul of the Purple & Gold return. See all the hard work and effort that went into making STAPLES Center ready for the return of Laker fans.

programme.title: Backstage: Lakers
programme.desc: The long anticipated return of LeBron James to the Lakers lineup, as well as what makes The King a champion on and off the court. Plus, a look at the extensive world of NBA fashion through the styles of LeBron and his Laker teammates.

programme.title: Backstage: Lakers
programme.desc: Finally, the moment Laker Nation has waited for -- championship banner #17, in the rafters, for all to see. A look at Montrezl Harrell, his journey to the NBA, his time in the purple & gold, and his life away from the basketball court.

programme.title: Backstage: Lakers
programme.desc: The Lakers' quest to defend their title is here. All access to a thrilling play-in game against Steph and the Warriors. Plus, the highest basketball honor is bestowed to a Lakers' legend, in a powerful ceremony for Kobe Bryant at the Hall of Fame.

programme.title: Backstage: Lakers
programme.desc: The purple and gold host the first playoff game in front of Laker faithful in over eight years: the journey to the NBA for second year guard Talen Horton-Tucker and all that he had to overcome.
